```{r}
library(ISLR)
library(MASS)
attach(Smarket)
cor(Lag1, Lag2)
cov(Lag1, Lag2)
qda.fit = qda(Direction ~ Lag1 + Lag2, data = Smarket, subset = train)
qda.fit
```
# 2. QDA predict
```{R}
qda.pred <- predict(qda.fit, Smarket.2005)
qda.pred
table(qda.pred$class, Smarket.2005$Direction)
mean(qda.pred$class == Smarket.2005$Direction)
```
